summary: App needs role-based authentication where admins log in via the user login and are redirected to a full-control admin interface, plus proper working social media links for Agrigence across platforms.

existing_features.title: Enable admins to sign in from the same login entry point as regular users and automatically open the admin interface when the signed-in identity is an admin. Specifically: after a successful Internet Identity login, check admin status via the existing admin check and redirect admins to "/admin"; redirect non-admin authenticated users to "/dashboard".

Replace the placeholder social media links in the site footer with working, correct URLs for Agrigence profiles using the provided handles, and open them in a new tab with safe link attributes. Use these URLs:
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/agrigence
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/agrigence.in
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/agrigence.in
- X: https://x.com/agrigence
- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@agrigence

new_feature_requests.summary: Add role-based login: admins can log in from the user login screen and are redirected to an admin interface with full control of the app
Add working social media links for Agrigence: LinkedIn @agrigence, Instagram @agrigence.in, Facebook @agrigence.in, X @agrigence, YouTube @agrigence

projectName: Admin login redirect to admin panel + fix Agrigence social media links
